  • Method Details

    • getAllSongs

      public List<Song> getAllSongs(Path folderPath) throws IOException
      Retrieves all valid song paths (MP3 or WAV) from the specified folder. This method scans the given folder shallowly, validates that it exists and is a directory, and then filters out the files to include only those with the `.mp3` or `.wav` extensions. The resulting list contains the paths of the files that match these formats. If the folder path is invalid (either doesn't exist or isn't a directory), an IOException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - The path of the folder to scan for music files.
      Returns:
      A list of paths to valid song files (MP3 or WAV) in the specified folder.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the folder does not exist, is not a directory, or if an error occurs while reading files.

    • getAllSongPaths

      public List<Path> getAllSongPaths(Path folderPath) throws IOException
      Retrieves all valid song file paths from the specified folder.

      This method checks whether the provided folder path exists and is indeed a directory. Then it filters the files within the directory, only returning those with supported file formats (e.g., MP3, WAV, M3U).

      Parameters:
      folderPath - The path of the folder to search for song files.
      Returns:
      A list of paths to song files that are in valid formats.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the folder path is invalid or an error occurs while reading the directory.

    • isValidFormat

      private boolean isValidFormat(Path filePath)
      Checks if the given file path represents a valid song file format (MP3, WAV, or M3U).

      This method checks whether the file has a valid extension such as ".mp3", ".wav", or ".m3u". It is used to filter files by their format in the folder.

      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the file to check.
      Returns:
      true if the file has a valid format, otherwise false.

    • getAllFiles

      private List<Path> getAllFiles(Path folderPath) throws IOException
      Retrieves all regular files (non-directory files) from the specified folder.

      This method lists all files in the provided folder and returns them as a list, ignoring any subdirectories.

      Parameters:
      folderPath - The path of the folder to list files from.
      Returns:
      A list of paths to all regular files in the folder.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the folder or if the folder path is invalid.

    • copyFileToDirectory

      public Path copyFileToDirectory(File sourceFile, Path targetDirectory) throws IOException
      Copies the given file to the target directory. If a file with the same name already exists, an IOException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      sourceFile - The file to copy.
      targetDirectory - The directory where the file should be copied.
      Returns:
      The path to the newly copied file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the target directory is invalid, the file already exists, or another I/O error occurs.
